TopicTitle: Help me prioritize 76+ mod updates - Updated

Articles.Content: Definitely a vote for Janitor's Closet - building felt really weird without it or Editor Extensions - thanks for updating the latter so quickly.

On 3/14/2018 at 12:09 PM, Mrcarrot said:

I know it's a small mod, but a must-have mod for both myself and my father is the K2 Command Pod.

It probably is fine, it's only a parts mod

On 3/14/2018 at 4:26 PM, monstah said:

These are the ones I really care about, but since you said 3-4, here's a bonus one (I wasn't aware you were taking care of the Quick* family!):
- QuickStart
 

The Quicks will probably be near the end, since I need to do some extra work for them, but this is added to m y list

 

On 3/15/2018 at 10:24 AM, CobaltWolf said:

I really don't play, so I don't have much skin in the game, but just wanted to toss you a quick 'thanks' for keeping so many mods going.

And, this is a possibly irrelevant question (as I am not a programmer), but if you know people you'd trust would you ever consider handing some of the mods off to keep your workload manageable? Though, I suppose that this sort of thing is only an issue when the game updates?

I tried that, wasn't happy with the result.  I do accept PRs, but prefer to keep control of the builds, etc.

18 hours ago, Warezcrawler said:

My vote is one at a time..... 

There are so many great mod in the list, and we are many who just appreciate the work you put into the community. Maybe take the ones you yourself find the best ones?

I am, but there comes a point when I need to decide what to do next.  This helps

6 hours ago, harrisjosh2711 said:

Since no one has said them yet FMRS & retractable lifting surface.

This isn't a list of who can think of something else to add.  I'll be doing them all, but I'm trying to get an idea of the most popular ones (or the ones most in need)

okay, now that Editor Extensions and RCS Build Aid are working, I would say the next ones to prioritize are:

FuseBox (it's quite difficult to design spacecraft without knowing how long its electric charge can last me)

PartCommander (vital when parts i need to access are clipped inside the middle of a spacecraft to keep the center of mass in the right place)

TakeCommand

KRASH

Janitor's Closet (This one isn't as urgent while we're still waiting for the really BIG parts-packs from other modders to be updated for KSP v1.4)

Edited March 16, 2018 by StevieC
Forgot one mod I really need prioritized

RCS Build Aid (already done I know :D)

KRASH

These two mods have improved my craft dramatically, and I appreciate your amazing work.

Kronal Vessel Viewer for better blueprints 

Thanks!

I wasn’t after “something else to add” I just really didn’t want to bother you considering the weight you have on ur shoulders. I only wanted to put in a word for those so you know that people are actually using them. Also, retractable lifting surface is a requirement for numerous mods, including my own. So I took my time read every single post In the forum to make sure I didn’t bother you with something someone had already mentioned

3 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:

I am counting the repeated mods to find which are most popular, trying to do those first

Oh yea, I got that. My comment about "since no one else has said anything" was more a reflection on why in the crap aren't more people interested in FMRS? Which in my book reigns among the most intuitive mods for KSP. Its simple, intuitive, and works just like it says. So when I seen no one had said anything about it, I had to, under the logic that this guy has 150+ mods and there is a high chance some of them do not get updated. As to the order in which you update that is totally your prerogative. Looking at ur track record its obvious you will accomplish more than I would ever ask even if I were paying you.

Contributions are always welcome, however.

I guess you didnt bother to read the OP, where I specifically say and ask for a list of 3-4 mods that you most miss/would like/feel absolutly necessary.  Spamming with a list of 40 is not helpful and will be ignored.
Definitely FMRS - creating re-usable stages is one of my favorite things to do in-game!

I will not update to the 1.4.1, at least for some months. But can I also give an opinion and try to help?  For me the Janitor's Closet is an essential mod to anyone using a lot of parts mods, or mods that adds many parts. 

Thanks for all the work!
Take Command Continued - I tested in 1.4.1, and it appears to work fine.
